original_text: They also took their livestock and their goods, which they had gained in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob and all his offspring with him,
korean_text: 그들의 가축과 가나안 땅에서 얻은 재물을 이끌었으며 야곱과 그의 자손들이 다함께 애굽으로 갔더라

sentences.original_text: which they had gained in the land of Canaan
Jacob and all his offspring with him
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱과 그의 모든 자손이 그와 함께
